questions.question: What chart shows parts of a whole as slices?
questions.explanation: Pie charts display proportions as circular slices.

questions.question: What plot shows individual points for two variables?
questions.explanation: Scatter plots reveal relationships between two continuous variables.

questions.question: What chart type shows trends over time?
questions.explanation: Line charts connect data points to display temporal trends.

questions.question: What is the most popular Python visualization library?
questions.explanation: Matplotlib is the foundational plotting library for Python.

questions.question: What chart uses rectangular bars to compare categories?
questions.explanation: Bar charts compare values across different categories.

questions.question: What visualization uses colors to represent matrix values?
questions.explanation: Heatmaps use color intensity to show data relationships.

questions.question: What plot displays distribution with quartiles and outliers?
questions.explanation: Box plots show median, quartiles, and extreme values.

questions.question: What library builds on Matplotlib with simpler syntax?
questions.explanation: Seaborn provides high-level statistical visualization functions.

questions.question: What chart shows frequency distribution with adjacent bars?
questions.explanation: Histograms display the distribution of continuous data.
